thread.title: 10.06.15 -- Target's Next Move: Digital Service Ambassadors
thread.title_full: 10.06.15 -- Target's Next Move: Digital Service Ambassadors

title: 10.06.15 -- Target's Next Move: Digital Service Ambassadors
text: Why Retailers Should Care About IoT Join ISR’s executive editor, Erin Harris, as she talks to Adan Pope, CTO at ShopperTrak, about the Internet of Things’ (IoT) impact on retail. During this insightful podcast, you’ll learn the true definition of IoT and why it matters to retailers of every size. You’ll also learn what IoT done right looks like in today’s evolved retail landscape. By Chester Ritchie, senior VP, Worldpay Learn how cloud-based solutions can give your business a leg up. By Christine Kern, contributing writer Target aims to boost omni-channel efforts through technology and personal interaction. In Case You Missed It By Christine Kern, contributing writer A promising early start in July couldn’t maintain momentum through August. Simplifying Sales Tax For E-Commerce Merchants States, counties, and municipalities have historically relied on local brick-and-mortar businesses to collect retail sales taxes. These businesses collected the sales tax from their customers, and then remitted the tax proceeds to their local sales tax jurisdiction. It was a straightforward process, and no one much quarreled with who owed the taxes and who would receive them.
